Name: Ante
Ingredients: 50 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Medium-dry, spiritous aromatised apple with delicate grape/berry fruit and faint orange.
History: The Ante notably features in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Ante contains 161 calories
